hero.title: Lagree, But make it like a Starlette.
hero.body:
Starlette is the first MicroLagree studio in Israel — a women-only space in the heart of Tel Aviv.



Lagree is the ultimate method for a sculpted body.

Control. Fluidity. Strength. Depth.

Real results. Lasting transformation.



More than just a workout. A whole universe.



For women who train like stars — and shine like them.



Ready to feel like a star?

experience.title: THE STARLETTE EXPERIENCE
experience.body:
REVEAL THE BEST VERSION OF YOURSELF.

STARLETTE IS A SPACE OF WELLNESS AND POWER —

CREATED BY A WOMAN, FOR WOMEN.



THE LAGREE METHOD HAS FINALLY ARRIVED IN ISRAEL.

AT STARLETTE, EVERY DETAIL MATTERS:

SEMI-PRIVATE SESSIONS (MAX. 5 WOMEN)

FOR A TRULY PERSONALIZED COACHING,

IN AN INTIMATE AND INSPIRING ENVIRONMENT.



HERE, TRANSFORMATION GOES BEYOND THE PHYSICAL—

IT'S EMOTIONAL, MENTAL, AND ENERGETIC TOO.



RADIANT. POWERFUL. UNSTOPPABLE.

WELCOME TO STARLETTE

newway.title: A NEW WAY TO MOVE
newway.body:
Discover Lagree : an INNOVATIVE method that pushes the LIMITS of traditional Pilates.



Short, intense, and low-impact sessions.

On the Micro deluxe, you'll experience a whole new way to train.



Slow, controlled, and targeted movements.

Strength and cardio combined —

a complete workout with proven results.



For those who love to challenge themselves —

With elegance, strength... and power.

bullets.one: Our welcome offer is valid step once, you may choose one of the two available options.
bullets.two: Buy the special deal combo up to 24 hours before the class start to be can cancel with 100 obstacle (no class pass).
bullets.three: All trial memberships expire after one month and cannot be extended, frozen, or reclaimed.
